unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed badly after that crazy rain in Maharashtra on 22/07/2023! Farmer Ramlal from my village, UP, lost his entire bajra crop. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana is good, but getting the claim approved is a headache, takes ages - remember 15/08/2022. Must check with NABARD. Hope things are better by next monsoon, say around 03:00 PM, 10/10/2024!
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed badly after that crazy rain in Maharashtra on twenty second july two thousand and twenty three! Farmer Ramlal from my village, U P, lost his entire bajra crop. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana is good, but getting the claim approved is a headache, takes ages - remember fifteenth august two thousand and twenty two. Must check with N A B A R D. Hope things are better by next monsoon, say around three P M, tenth october two thousand and twenty four!
